title: Prototype token-count badge for README
description: Inspired by NanoClaw's repo-tokens/badge.svg. Create a script that counts repo tokens (using tiktoken or approximation) and generates an SVG badge showing token count + percentage of Claude context window (200k). Place in README as adoption signal for AI-native projects. Steps: (1) write token counting script (Go or shell), (2) generate SVG badge, (3) add to README near top, (4) optionally add to CI for auto-update.
close_reason: Abandoned. Token count badge already shipped in commit 731acbb.

title: Implement miro_upload_document (multipart file upload)
description: Add UploadDocument method following UploadImage pattern. Multipart form-data POST to /v2/boards/{board_id}/documents. Supports pdf and common doc formats. Max 6MB. Args: board_id, file_path, title, x, y, parent_id. Needs: types, client method, interface, tool definition, handler registration, mock, tests.
close_reason: Implemented miro_upload_document: types, client method, interface, tool definition, handler, mock, 5 tests. All passing, lint clean.

title: Implement miro_update_image_from_file and miro_update_document_from_file (PATCH multipart)
description: Two new tools: PATCH multipart to replace files on existing image/document items. Same multipart pattern as upload tools but PATCH method with item_id. Both support title, position, geometry, parent, altText fields.
close_reason: Implemented both PATCH multipart tools + refactored shared buildMultipartBody helper. 89 tools, all tests green, lint clean.

title: ToolSpec quality pass: apply Graham taste test across all 7 MCP servers
description: Run Graham's 'I could do better than that' test on ToolSpec descriptions across all 7 MCP servers. Rewrite the weakest 5 descriptions using the 'suggestive' principle (descriptions that help the LLM envision the right use case). Measure tool selection improvement via evals framework. Servers: miro, gleif, figjam, code-to-arch, productplan, nordic-registry, mediawiki. Reference: AI-Knowledge/Design Taste as Specification - Paul Graham.md
close_reason: Rewrote 6 weakest ToolSpec descriptions (get_board, create_text, create_embed, list_tags, attach_tag, detach_tag) with USE WHEN, disambiguation cross-refs, and FAILS WHEN. Added 3 confusion pair evals and 5 tool selection tests. Commit 9cabead.
